marvelstars.name: Tony Stark
marvelstars.powers: Iron Man possesses powered armor that gives him superhuman strength and durability, flight, and an array of weapons

marvelstars.name: Steve Rogers
marvelstars.powers: Superhuman strength, agility, and endurance due to the Super-Soldier Serum. Skilled martial artist and expert with the vibranium shield.

marvelstars.name: Natasha Romanoff
marvelstars.powers: Expert martial artist, marksmanship, and hand-to-hand combat. Skilled spy and master of espionage.
